pair.hint: Enter the URL of your PRTG server, a valid username and the passhash of the user you want to login with.
pair.server: The hostname or IP address of the server that PRTG is running at.
pair.username: The username you want to login with.
pair.passhash: The passhash that belongs to the user you've selected.

error.incomplete_login: Incomplete login data, please fill in all the fields.
error.connection_failed: Couldn't connect to PRTG, please review the credentials.

pair.login: Press the login button to connect to the PRTG instance.
